sentence.Network_en: The civil war has raged almost continuously since 1976.
sentence.Network_cn: 自从1976年开始，内战几乎没有中断过。

sentence.Network_en: It is the oldest continuously inhabited city in America.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是美国最古老的一直有人居住的城市。

sentence.Network_en: If you take these drugs continuously, withdrawal must be tapered.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你一直在服用这些药，停药时一定要逐渐停。

PerfectNetExp.abs: The crown - fungus has changed continuously in response to the living substrate provided by man ., 冠锈菌随着人们所提供的生活基物而不断变化.

list.abs: ...entation”，是指一个人在情感、浪漫、与性上对男性及女性有何种型态的耐久吸引。最近几十年的研究表明，性倾向是个程度渐进的连续(continuous)概念，好比肤色。每个人的性倾向位于从“只对异性感兴趣”到“只对同性感兴趣”之间的某个位置。通常，性倾向被归为三类：异性恋(对异性产生浪漫情感与性的吸引)、.

entry.tran: 连续不断的;持续的;不中断的
entry.def: A continuous process or event continues for a period of time without stopping.

example.ex: Residents report that they heard continuous gunfire.
example.tran: 居民们报告说他们听到了连续不断的枪声。

example.ex: ...all employees who had a record of five years' continuous employment with the firm...
example.tran: 所有在公司连续任职达5年的员工

entry.tran: (线、表面等)连续的，没有间隔的
entry.def: A continuous line or surface has no gaps or holes in it.

example.tran: 一条人物雕像构成的檐壁

entry.def: In English grammar, continuous verb groups are formed using the auxiliary 'be' and the present participle of a verb, as in 'I'm feeling a bit tired' and 'She had been watching them for some time'. Continuous verb groups are used especially when you are focusing on a particular moment.

sentences.sentence: "dance inspires him ceaselessly to strive higher and higher toward the shining pinnacle of perfection that is the goal of every artiste"

auth_sentence.content: A world population where life expectancy is continuously increasing.
auth_sentence.res_content: A world population where life expectancy is continuously increasing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A world population where life expectancy is continuously increasing.

auth_sentence.content: Cook, stirring continuously, for about a minute.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cook, stirring continuously, for about a minute.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cook, stirring continuously, for about a minute.

auth_sentence.content: How can canaries sing continuously for minutes on end?
auth_sentence.res_content: How can canaries sing continuously for minutes on end?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How can canaries sing continuously for minutes on end?

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
sufficient足够的+ly……地→adv.十分地,充分地
undoubted无疑的,确实的+ly……地→adv.无庸置疑地,的确地
unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

sentences.en: Athletes have to train continuously to stay in peak condition.
sentences.cn: 运动员必须不断训练才能保持最佳竞技状态。

sentences.en: If we forge ahead continuously without a break,we’ll be able to raise efficiency.
sentences.cn: 如果我们不停顿地继续前进,我们就能提高效率。
